name: Fillomino Infinite
description:
Fillomino Infinite offers unlimited enjoyment of the classic number-placing logic puzzle.

Features:
-Puzzle generator that provides new Fillominos on demand, from size 4x4 to 20x20, with three difficulty levels
-Easy to use puzzle solving interface
-Autodetection of solving errors and puzzle completion
-Unlimited undo
-Autosave of progress
-No microtransactions, no social media integration, no ads, no meaningless point system, just you and a whole bunch of Fillominos to solve
